features: Freedom of movement: The soft, lightweight fabric and tapered fit make it easy to move, however steep the slope or fast your pace
Durable comfort: The 4-way stretch fabric is also really durable meaning this pant will last
Outdoor versatile: Effortlessly adapts with belt hooks, leg adjustments, strategic pockets and a fly opening
4 Way stretch: The fabric stretches in all 4 directions with the support of elastic yarns
Tapered fit: For bottoms, Tapered fit is a modern cut with room in the seat and tapered legs
